
Changelog
=========

0.3.0 (2017-11-03)
------------------

* Remove ``magic_version`` - not available in old ``libmagic.so``.
* Remove ``magic`` object - will break import if there's a load failure.

0.2.1 (2017-11-02)
------------------

* Release without wheels.

0.2.0 (2017-11-02)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
